description: A large public plaza on Fish-Man Island where important gatherings and events take place. It became the site of Queen Otohime's assassination.

keyEvents.title: Citizens Support Otohime's Dream
keyEvents.description: The citizens of Fish-Man Island gather at Gyoncorde Plaza to support Queen Otohime's petition for peaceful coexistence with humans, with boxes overflowing with signatures.
keyEvents.significance: Represents the culmination of Otohime's seven years of effort and shows that peaceful change seemed achievable.

keyEvents.title: Signature Boxes Set on Fire
keyEvents.description: Someone deliberately sets fire to the boxes containing the collected signatures at Gyoncorde Plaza, creating chaos.
keyEvents.significance: This arson creates the distraction for Otohime's assassination and destroys physical evidence of the citizens' support for peace.

keyEvents.title: Queen Otohime Assassinated
keyEvents.description: During the chaos at Gyoncorde Plaza, Queen Otohime is shot and mortally wounded by a hidden assassin (later revealed to be Hody Jones).
keyEvents.significance: This assassination at Gyoncorde Plaza becomes one of the most traumatic events in Fish-Man Island history, shaping the island's future for a decade.

keyEvents.title: Vander Decken Marks Shirahoshi
keyEvents.description: At Gyoncorde Plaza during the chaos, Vander Decken IX marks Shirahoshi with his Mato Mato no Mi power.
keyEvents.significance: This marking leads to Shirahoshi's ten-year imprisonment and shapes her character arc.

keyEvents.title: Otohime's Final Moments
keyEvents.description: Queen Otohime spends her final moments at Gyoncorde Plaza, asking her people not to hate her killer and sharing a final pinky promise with her children.
keyEvents.significance: Otohime's death at this public plaza creates a lasting trauma for all who witnessed it and cements her legacy as a martyr for peace.

statusHistory.reason: Public plaza remains active on Fish-Man Island

description: The royal palace of the Ryugu Kingdom on Fish-Man Island, home to King Neptune and his family.

keyEvents.title: Shirahoshi's Power Revealed to Brothers
keyEvents.description: At Ryugu Palace, Queen Otohime reveals to her sons that Shirahoshi is the legendary Mermaid Princess who can communicate with Sea Kings.
keyEvents.significance: This revelation at the palace sets up the brothers' protective roles and explains Shirahoshi's importance to the world.
